message.content:
cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.AI, cs.CC 

The paper deals with the problem of learning parameters in graphical models, which is a common topic in machine learning and statistics. The paper also mentions the use of optimization procedures and the inherent repulsive property of the marginal polytope boundary, which suggests a connection to optimization and information theory. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.IT (Information Theory), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CC (Computational Complexity).
